description: Defines a Pydantic model for session summaries, including fields for summary text and optional topics, with methods to serialize to dictionary and JSON.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the SessionSummary instance to a dictionary, excluding None values.

methods.name: to_json
methods.description: Serializes the SessionSummary instance to a JSON string, excluding None values, with indentation.
